_header: O God we pray to Thee in special
_description: A prayer for all souls — three five-line stanzas (aaaabc) with refrain: ‘Et lux perpetua / Et lux perpetua luceat eis’, and 2-line burden: ‘For all cristen saulys pray we / Requiem eternam dona eis domi[ne]’

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
O god we pray to the in specyallFor all the saulis that sufferd
                    payne infernall…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…These saulys þou graunte joy & blysseFor wham this
                    day we syng & cryeEt lux perpetua[Et lux perpetua luceat
                        eis]
